'''Tosser Grubb''' is a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] in [[The Hobbit (film series)|''The Hobbit'' film series]]. He was was portrayed by Merv Smith.

== History ==
Tosser Grubb was the auctioneer for [[Messrs Grubb, Grubb and Burrowes]] in charge of selling [[Bilbo Baggins]]'s possessions and [[Bag End]]. When Bilbo himself arrived, Tosser was apprehensive. Bilbo gave him the contract he had with the Dwarves, which Tosser found sufficient to prove his identity.<ref>''[[The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies]]''</ref>
